summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of redesigned Claude.ai-style login page. All frontend features are working perfectly including responsive design, two-step email form, navigation, and backend API integration.
passed_tests: Login page loads at / with Claude.ai-style design (beige background #F5F1EB)
Desktop view shows proper split layout (beige left side, video right side)
Mobile view shows stacked layout with video section at bottom
Two-step email form flow (email first, then password appears after Continue)
Navigation header with dropdown indicators (7 nav items with chevron icons)
Try EKA-AI button navigates correctly to /claude-chat
Google login button present with proper styling
Mobile responsive design with proper stacking
Login form submission integrates with backend API (/api/auth/login)
Backend API returns proper 401 error for invalid credentials
Form validation and error display working
Video/image fallback system working on both desktop and mobile
